U.S. Senator Kirsten Gillibrand spoke during a roundtable discussion about the employment future of military veterans held at the Southside Innovation Center. Bill Lockyer , California's state treasurer, participated in a national telephonic news conference with EPI officials, to denounce the bankruptcy concept. No state needs to declare bankruptcy, Bill Lockyer said, "The states have sovereign taxing power the big companies don't." Bill Lockyer 's point-- a valid one-- is that bankruptcy is the refuge for individuals, corporations and local governments

The move follows last month's resignation of ex-News of the World editor Andy Coulson amid continuing controversy surrounding phone-hacking allegations. embroiled Prime Minister David Cameron 's media chief. Keir Starmer , Director of Public Prosecutions, said the Crown Prosecution Service( CPS) would conduct a "comprehensive assessment" of evidence collected by detectives. The purpose of this assessment is to ascertain whether there is any material which could now form evidence in any future criminal prosecution relating to phone hacking, the CPS said in a statement.
